thread.title: Gary L Sunderland
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Gary L Sunderland

author: Gary L Sunderland
title: Gary L Sunderland
text: I had a very favorable trip to Gardner White. My sales person (Eric) was very friendly, knowledgeable and thorough. He allowed me time to look at options and did not try to push me one way or the other. Delivery arrangements were made and the delivery of my new bedroom set was right on time. The installers were once again very friendly and they wasted no time in setting everything up. It looks great!
